name: FastStone Language File
summary: Learn about .FSLANG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FastStone publishes free and shareware software used to view and convert images and take screen captures. These programs, including Image Viewer, Capture, MaxView, and Photo Resizer, are available from FastStone's website.

Capture and Image Viewer include several FSLANG files, used to change the language in which the programs' UI appears. For example, in FastStone Capture, users can select Settings → Language to change the program's language, using the program's 17 FSLANG files.

description: An FSLANG file is a settings file used by FastStone Capture and FastStone Image Viewer. It is used to change the language of the programs' user interface (UI). Capture and Image Viewer include many FSLANG files, stored in the programs' Languages directories.

instructions: FSLANG files are not meant to be opened. To use an FSLANG file with FastStone Capture or Image Viewer, make sure the file is stored in the program's Languages directory. Then, select Settings → Language from the program's menu bar, and select the language that corresponds to your FSLANG file.
